altername_name: フェニックスライト：エース弁護士
逆转裁判: 复苏的逆转
逆転裁判 - 蘇る逆転
name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney
overview: Not everyone is innocent until proven guilty! Players star as a defense attorney, who must prove his seemingly guilty client's innocence no matter how dire the circumstances may seem. The game presents twisting storylines and intriguing gameplay in a comical anime style. Players must collect evidence, weed through inconsistent testimonies, and overcome corrupt agendas to ensure that justice prevails.
